title: How to block YouTube ads on YouTube app?
text:
How to Block YouTube Ads on YouTube App?
Are you tired of watching ads on YouTube and wanting to get rid of them? You’re not alone! Many users are looking for ways to block YouTube ads on the YouTube app. In this article, we’ll show you how to do just that.
Method 1: Using Ad Blockers
One of the most effective ways to block YouTube ads is by using ad blockers. Ad blockers are software that blocks ads from appearing on websites and apps, including YouTube. Here are some popular ad blockers you can use:
uBlock Origin : A popular ad blocker that is available for both desktop and mobile devices.
AdBlock Plus : Another popular ad blocker that is available for both desktop and mobile devices.
AdGuard : A powerful ad blocker that is available for both desktop and mobile devices.
To use an ad blocker on YouTube, follow these steps:
Download and install the ad blocker of your choice.
Open the YouTube app and navigate to the video you want to watch.
Tap the three vertical dots on the top right corner of the screen.
Tap "Settings" and then "Site settings".
Scroll down to the "Advertising" section and toggle on "Block ads".
Restart the YouTube app and you should no longer see ads.
Method 2: Using YouTube’s Built-in Ad Blocker
YouTube has a built-in ad blocker that you can use to block ads. Here’s how:
Open the YouTube app and navigate to the video you want to watch.
Tap the three vertical dots on the top right corner of the screen.
Tap "Settings" and then "Site settings".
Scroll down to the "Advertising" section and toggle on "Block ads".
Restart the YouTube app and you should no longer see ads.
Method 3: Using a VPN
Another way to block YouTube ads is by using a VPN (Virtual Private Network). A VPN can help you block ads by changing your IP address and making it look like you’re accessing YouTube from a different location. Here’s how:
Download and install a VPN app on your device.
Open the VPN app and connect to a server in a country where YouTube ads are blocked.
Open the YouTube app and navigate to the video you want to watch.
You should no longer see ads.
Method 4: Using a Browser Extension
If you’re using a browser to access YouTube, you can use a browser extension to block ads. Here are some popular browser extensions you can use:
uBlock Origin : A popular ad blocker that is available for both Chrome and Firefox.
AdBlock Plus : Another popular ad blocker that is available for both Chrome and Firefox.
AdGuard : A powerful ad blocker that is available for both Chrome and Firefox.
To use a browser extension to block YouTube ads, follow these steps:
Download and install the browser extension of your choice.
Open the YouTube website in your browser.
Click the extension icon in the top right corner of the browser window.
Click "Block ads" and you should no longer see ads.
Frequently Asked Questions
Q: Are ad blockers illegal?
A: No, ad blockers are not illegal. However, some websites may not work properly if you’re using an ad blocker.
Q: Will ad blockers slow down my internet speed?
A: No, ad blockers should not slow down your internet speed. However, if you’re using a VPN, it may slow down your internet speed.
Q: Can I use ad blockers on all websites?
A: Yes, ad blockers can be used on all websites, not just YouTube.
Q: Are there any free ad blockers available?
A: Yes, there are many free ad blockers available. However, some ad blockers may have limitations or require you to pay for premium features.
Q: Can I use ad blockers on my mobile device?
A: Yes, ad blockers are available for both desktop and mobile devices.
Q: Will ad blockers block all ads?
A: No, ad blockers may not block all ads. Some ads may be able to bypass ad blockers.
Q: Can I use ad blockers on YouTube Premium?
A: Yes, ad blockers can be used on YouTube Premium. However, you may need to use a VPN to block ads on YouTube Premium.
Q: Are ad blockers safe to use?
A: Yes, ad blockers are generally safe to use. However, it’s always a good idea to be cautious when downloading and installing software.
Conclusion
Blocking YouTube ads is a simple process that can be done using ad blockers, YouTube’s built-in ad blocker, a VPN, or a browser extension. By following the methods outlined in this article, you can enjoy ad-free YouTube videos. Remember to always be cautious when downloading and installing software, and to check the terms of service of any ad blocker you use.
